Parts:
Please write a limerick concering a software coder struggling to write
in idomatic Go (Golang).

A coder who programmed in Go
Found his elegant, beautiful flow
With "err" checks galore,
Became a dull chore,
Crying, "Where did my "try/catch" block go?"

That's great; thank you.

Please write another limerick concering a software coder struggling to write
goroutines in idomatic Go. This might feature deadlocks.

Of course! Here you go:

A coder who launched with a "go,"
Believed his performance would grow.
But a channel would wait,
And a mutex, its mate,
While the deadlock just sat there and said, "No."
